summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 47th Street and East 50th Street, each from 19th Avenue Northeast to 21st Avenue Northeast; East 45th Street from west margin of 20th Avenue Northeast to east margin of 21st Avenue Northeast; 20th Avenue Northeast, and 21st Avenue Northeast, each from south margin of East 45th Street to the north margin of East 50th Street; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, by grading and curbing where necessary, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3682, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
